mapper.insert: INSERT INTO experiment_project (name, category, description, level, image_url, video_url, created_at, updated_at, audit_status, publish_status, created_by) VALUES (#{name}, #{category}, #{description}, #{level}, #{imageUrl}, #{videoUrl}, NOW(), NOW(), 'draft', 'unpublished', #{createdBy})
mapper.update: UPDATE experiment_project SET name = #{name}, category = #{category}, description = #{description}, level = #{level}, image_url = #{imageUrl}, video_url = #{videoUrl}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, name, category, description, level, image_url as imageUrl, video_url as videoUrl, created_at as createdAt, updated_at as updatedAt, audit_status as auditStatus, publish_status as publishStatus, created_by as createdBy FROM experiment_project WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT id, name, category, description, level, image_url as imageUrl, video_url as videoUrl, created_at as createdAt, updated_at as updatedAt, audit_status as auditStatus, publish_status as publishStatus, created_by as createdBy FROM experiment_project ORDER BY created_at DESC

SELECT id, name, category, description, level, image_url as imageUrl, video_url as videoUrl, created_at as createdAt, updated_at as updatedAt, audit_status as auditStatus, publish_status as publishStatus, created_by as createdBy FROM experiment_project WHERE level = #{type} ORDER BY created_at DESC

SELECT id, name, category, description, level, image_url as imageUrl, video_url as videoUrl, created_at as createdAt, updated_at as updatedAt, audit_status as auditStatus, publish_status as publishStatus, created_by as createdBy FROM experiment_project WHERE category = #{category} ORDER BY created_at DESC

SELECT id, name, category, description, level, image_url as imageUrl, video_url as videoUrl, created_at as createdAt, updated_at as updatedAt, audit_status as auditStatus, publish_status as publishStatus, created_by as createdBy FROM experiment_project WHERE publish_status = #{status} ORDER BY created_at DESC

SELECT id, name, category, description, level, image_url as imageUrl, video_url as videoUrl, created_at as createdAt, updated_at as updatedAt, audit_status as auditStatus, publish_status as publishStatus, created_by as createdBy FROM experiment_project WHERE created_by = #{uploader} ORDER BY created_at DESC

SELECT id, name, category, description, level, image_url as imageUrl, video_url as videoUrl, created_at as createdAt, updated_at as updatedAt, audit_status as auditStatus, publish_status as publishStatus, created_by as createdBy FROM experiment_project WHERE name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%') ORDER BY created_at DESC
